title: GitGlance
description: A dashboard that visualizes your GitHub contribution graph as a 3D city using Three.js.

title: PromptPay
description: A micro-SaaS platform where users can sell highly-optimized LLM prompts.

title: FocusFlow
description: A Pomodoro timer that automatically pauses your Spotify music when the break ends.

title: CodeSnap CLI
description: A terminal tool that takes beautiful screenshots of your code snippets for Twitter.

title: BugBounty Hunter
description: An aggregator that swipes through open-source 'Good First Issues' from GitHub.
